name: Sadownik
description:
Introduction

A game prepared for Polish game jam in 7 days. The title was “Poland in the game”.

Among the crops associated with Poland, apples certainly stand out; they are the main export fruit.

In 2019, Poland was the largest in the UE, and third largest in the world producer of this fruit. We wanted to refer to this when choosing the theme for our game. The gameplay is based on an alternative way of collecting apples. Stylistically it is based on positive associations with the idyllic atmosphere of Polish villages. The player's goal is to collect as many good fruits as possible in a limited time.

Rules

There are three types of apples in the game, to which different point values are assigned:

  • Red apples: 500+ points
  • Golden apples: 2000+ points
  • Rotten apples: 5000- points

The player earns points by placing fruits in a basket; his task is to collect as many points as possible in a limited time. 

Controls

  • Move left/right using arrows or A, D
  • Jump using W, Space, or Up arrow
  • Push apples using fan: Left Mouse Button
  • Pull apples using fan: Right Mouse Button
